1.text: A Psalm or Song for the sons of Korah. His foundation is in the holy mountains.

2.text: The LORD loveth the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.

3.text: Glorious things are spoken of thee, O city of God. Selah.

4.text: I will make mention of Rahab and Babylon to them that know me: behold Philistia, and Tyre, with Ethiopia; this man was born there.

5.text: And of Zion it shall be said, This and that man was born in her: and the highest himself shall establish her.

6.text: The LORD shall count, when he writeth up the people, that this man was born there. Selah.

7.text: As well the singers as the players on instruments shall be there: all my springs are in thee.
